name: Lost: Find
description:
This is a turn-based casual game. Players can attack or restore blood volume according to the value of the sieve, and pass the level by defeating the boss.
Different combinations of sieves will produce different skills, and random values can be generated by rolling again. The sieve can also be replaced.
Pay attention to the skills of the boss in each round, formulate the corresponding strategy, you can quickly pass the level.
Click on the developer name DSGame to open the developer page to see more games, welcome to follow our developer account.
